body.name: ViewSonic VX3276-MHD 32 Inch 1080p Widescreen IPS Monitor with Ultra-Thin Bezels, Screen Split Capability HDMI and DisplayPort

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 16 mins
features: FORM & FUNCTION: With ultra-slim bezels design, Full HD (1920x1080p) resolution, and premium IPS panel, this monitor looks as good as it performs.Specific uses for product - Gaming
AMAZING AT ANY ANGLE: IPS panel ensures stunning views no matter your vantage point
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: Flicker-Free technology and Blue Light Filter for all-day comfort
SCREEN SPLIT: ViewSplit software boosts productivity by dividing your screen into multiple viewing windows. Download at ViewSonic website
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The VX3276-MHD supports laptops, PCs, and Macs with HDMI, DisplayPort, and VGA inputs
INCLUDED IN THE BOX: LCD Monitor, Power Cable, HDMI Cable
body.description: The ViewSonic VX3276-mhd is a sleek 32” Full HD monitor with a modern and minimalist style perfect for home and office use. With Super clear IPS panel technology, this monitor offers best-in-class screen performance with ultra-wide viewing angles. A premium ID Includes an ultra-slim profile, unique desktop stand, and a sleek edge-to-edge frameless design, that when combined with vivid 1920x1080 resolution and dual speakers, deliver an immersive viewing experience for home entertainment, multimedia applications, and office work. Hdmi, DisplayPort, and VGA inputs offer flexible connectivity options for both computing and gaming environments, while ViewSonic' S exclusive view mode feature provides intuitive presets for optimized screen performance in different applications. In addition, flicker-free technology and a blue light filter help to minimize eyestrain from extended viewing periods. With ViewSonic' S 3-year limited , This monitor is a solid long-term investment that combines style and high performance on any desktop. The brightness is 250 cd/m2. Video Signal - Frequency Horizontal - 24 83KHz, Frequency Vertical - 50 75Hz. Display Area: 698.4mm (H) x 392.85mm (V).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VX3276-MHD A Modern Work of Art

Ultra-Slim Panel This VX3276-MHD display features an ultra slim panel for a breathtaking viewing experience. A sleek design enables this monitor to blend seamlessly into any room. Stunning Full HD Resolution Enjoy a premium viewing experience with stunning Full HD resolution. That’s 2X more pixels than standard HD resolution. Frameless Design Enjoy more room to see what matters most. A frameless design provides a seamless viewing experience individually and in multi-monitor setups. IPS Panel Technology With SuperClear IPS technology, this monitor delivers consistent, accurate images no matter which angle you’re looking at the screen.

Versatile Connectivity DisplayPort, HDMI and VGA inputs give you the freedom to connect your monitor to a variety of devices. Optimized View Settings ViewSonic’s unique ViewMode feature offers 'Game,' 'Movie,' 'Web,' 'Text,' and 'Mono' presets. Take your viewing experience to the next level no matter what you’re watching. Dual Integrated Speakers With dual integrated speakers, this monitor combines incredible screen performance with immersive stereo sound for a delightful audiovisual experience.

Previous page Eye Care Flicker-Free and Blue Light technology help reduce eye strain over extended periods. VESA Compatible Mount Easily install your monitor on a VESA-compatible wall mount or stand. Next page 1 Eye Care 2 VESA Mount

Can I connect my MacBook or iMac to the monitor? Yes, this monitor works with both MacBook and iMac. Before proceeding, please make sure that the connectivity ports on your MacBook or laptop are compatible with your ViewSonic monitor. Does this monitor come with a built-in web camera? No. This monitor does not come with a web camera. Is this monitor ergonomic? This monitor comes with tilt feature, but not pivot, swivel and height adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent home or office use "IPS 2K" monitor ... consider this alternative to "4K VA"
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice quality monitor from Viewsonic. First off, I do not play video games, so my review pertains to home and office type use (MS Office, Web browsing, light duty photo editing, etc.). Having a 4K VA panel 32" monitor in the office, I can honestly say that this 2K IPS 32" monitor is a better value for the money. While I can still read text at the full 4K resolution, it is simply uncomfortable for a long time. A more pleasant resolution setting I use in the office is somewhere between 2K and 4K (more towards the 2K mark). Given that experience, I went for the 2K IPS monitor of the same 32" size at home. The IPS panel vs. VA is a whole lot better, esp. with text on the screen; the VA has some slight but noticeable artifacts with text where the IPS is simply clear. The resolution is comfortable and at this 32" size there is plenty of "real estate". So, if you are looking inside the $400 price range for a 32" monitor don't get fooled by 4K unless you are planning to watch 4K TV on it perhaps? For home/office use, the 2K IPS is not only cheaper (less than $300) but fits the bill much better.I did a lot of researching and then, at work, I was able to get the 32" 4K VA panel monitor and, to be honest, it is a disappointing experience for office use; I do not run the full 4K resolution and the VA quality just is not as good as the IPS panel. Having the 32" 2K IPS (this Viewsonic) at home and given my experience with it, I would have requested the same for the office if I had to do it again. So, while 4K is good for some things for others 2K is preferable in my experience. If you get a chance to compare monitors in this price range for home/office use, you may find the same.Viewsonic is also a top notch brand with a 3 yr warranty. This particular model also has the frameless edge. Not only is the picture quality excellent but the monitor has a nice high quality look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent monitor, good price
reviews.reviewText: This monitor was a very good deal. Im using it with another monitor as a dual set up. It makes my other monitor look sad. This monitor has a very clear picture, no eye fatigue and the colors are excellent. I will probably replace the other monitor with one of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Visual Feast on My Desk!
reviews.reviewText: The ViewSonic 32 Inch 1080p Widescreen IPS Monitor has truly transformed my computing experience. From the moment I powered it on, I was captivated by the stunning visuals and vibrant colors that this monitor delivers.The 1080p resolution is perfect for my work and entertainment needs. Whether I'm editing photos, streaming movies, or working on spreadsheets, the clarity and detail are remarkable. The widescreen aspect ratio adds an extra layer of immersion, making every task feel more engaging.The IPS panel technology is a game-changer. The wide viewing angles ensure that I get consistent colors and sharpness no matter where I'm sitting. This is a huge advantage when collaborating with others or simply enjoying content from different angles.The monitor's build quality is top-notch. It feels sturdy and well-made, and the slim bezels give it a modern and sleek look that complements any workspace. Setting it up was a breeze, and I appreciate the thoughtful cable management design that keeps my desk clutter-free.I was pleasantly surprised by the variety of connectivity options this monitor offers. From HDMI to DisplayPort, it's clear that ViewSonic has designed this monitor with versatility in mind. The built-in speakers are a convenient addition for when I want to enjoy audio without using external speakers.But what truly sets this monitor apart is the value for the price. Getting a 32-inch display with these features at this price point is an absolute steal.Whether you're a professional seeking a reliable display for your creative tasks or someone who simply wants a stunning monitor for entertainment, the ViewSonic 32 Inch 1080p Widescreen IPS Monitor won't disappoint. It's a visual feast that brings a new level of enjoyment to my daily computing routine. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice monitor for office work and light gaming
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, perfect resolution, works with an HDMI 4-way KVM, not for top-end gaming (60 Hz, top of the line monitors cost 2-3X more and do 120Hz plus). The stand is solid and if you want to VESA mount it has the standard 100mm holes. Been using it for a month or two.

Excellent picture quality, nice and delicate design with button functions on the back of the screen, and also nice colors, I am very happy that I bought this monitor ! Thank you !Thanks to ViewSonic Corporation !

reviews.reviewTitle: Monitor bonito e de boa imagem
reviews.reviewText: O monitor é muito bonito, de espessura fina, tem um toque moderno e funciona perfeitamente conectado ao MacBook, com o cabo mini DisplayPort. Mantive a configuração original (que funciona muito bem) pois configurar é um pouco chato, devido aos botões traseiros não terem indicação de sua funcionalidade. O som do monitor não é bom, uso sempre com o som nativo do MacBook ou com fone ou caixa de som. Mas mesmo com essas questões, vale a pena! Eu adoro o layout do monitor. É realmente muito bonito.
Quedé sorprendido de la calidad, nitidez, colores. Superó mis espectativas. Estoy muy contento de poder trabajar con equipo profesional como este monitor. Su calidad 4k para videos es genial.

En general, me ha gustado bastante este monitor de ViewSonic. Su precio lo convierte en una de las opciones más económicas a la hora de comprar un monitor de 32 pulgadas con resolución 1440p. Sin embargo, ViewSonic no ha escatimado esfuerzos en dotar al monitor de un buen panel IPS, que proporciona unos excelentes colores.Las entradas de señal de vídeo son las habituales para el rango de precios en el que se mueve el monitor: dos HDMI y un DisplayPort.çEl menú de configuración es bastante amplio, permitiendo configurar muchos parámetros del mismo.Ahora bien, al monitor le encuentro varios "peros":-Si tienes conectados dos PC al mismo, no me gusta que, cuando reinicias uno de ellos, el monitor pasa automáticamente a la otra entrada de vídeo, en lugar de permanecer en la entrada que usaba el otro PC.-La ubicación de los botones del menú es bastante incómoda, estando estos en el lateral derecho del monitor. Así que olvidaos de ponerle un segundo monitor por ese lado, porque no podréis acceder a los botones, ni siquiera para encenderlo, sin tener que mover el otro monitor. Configuraciones con tres de estos monitores iguales quedan completamente descartadas.-La peana no tiene regulación de altura aunque, si tu altura es entre 1,60 y 1,70 metros, esto no debería de ser inconveniente ninguno.Aun así, me parece un monitor realmente excelente, que tiene más pros a su favor que contras. Aunque reconozco que lo de los botones en el lateral no me resulta para nada cómodo.

Superbe écran. Couleurs fidèles, quasiment aucune bordure, ultraplat, et connexions juste ce dont j'ai besoin. Le système d'attache mural est au standard VESA (pas de 10 en carré), ce qui n'est pas le cas de tous les écrans, c'est pour cette raison que j'ai choisi ce modèle. 2 reproches cependant, mais rien de grave. 1) Les touches de réglages sont un peu alambiquées et 2) les hauts-parleurs d'origine sont pourraves, pour y remédier, j'ai connecté un petit HP externe via un câble audio. En choisissant une résolution full HD en 32 pouces, l'image est plus grande proportionnellement à un écran de diagonale inférieure, ce que je recherchais. Avec une résolution 4K, sur une dalle de cette taille, les vignettes sont minuscules, les pages web rikiki et les copies écran monstrueuses en poids.
